articles.description: The promoters are looking to sell stake worth around Rs 303 crore with a possibility of increasing the sale by another Rs 116 crore under the greenshoe option, as per a report by CNBC-TV18.
articles.content:
Shares of APL Apollo Tubes fell over 3 percent in early trade on August 29 after a block deal involving 1.5 percent stake in the company took place on the bourses today.
Around 38 lakh shares, or a … [+2442 chars]

articles.title: Trade Spotlight | Your strategy for Laxmi Organic, Finolex Industries, Angel One today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Laxmi Organic Industries has seen a decisive breakout of almost four-month consolidation and rallied 8.4 percent to Rs 285.85. The stock has formed robust bullish candlestick pattern on the daily charts with multi-fold jump in volumes.
articles.content: The market snapped a two-day fall and rebounded on August 28 with moderate gains resting on the 19,200-19,250 zone, which is expected to play as a support for the Nifty50 in the coming days and break… [+4137 chars]
